card_1.cardText:
> _“Let us not take ourselves too seriously. None of us has a monopoly of wisdom.”_

Queen Elizabeth II

card_10.cardText:
President Trump, joined by his wife, met Queen Elizabeth for tea Friday during his European trip. Queen Elizabeth has met with every U.S. President since 1951 - except for Pres. Johnson.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-07-13-qtd/)

body:
• Here’s How Every Meeting Between the Queen and a U.S. President WentA http://time.com/5333083/queen-elizabeth-trump-visit-presidents/
